title: Instant Abstract Books
description: Generate an abstract book in a PDF or other format instantly with just the click of a button.

title: Delegate Networking
description: Allow your delegates to chat freely with instant messaging and group chat ability.

title: Poster Gallery
description: Wow your audience with an interactive and engaging poster gallery.

title: Access Controls
description: Share your event content with only those you select.

title: Sponsors
description: Display your event sponsors across the platform including sponsored sessions.

title: Exhibitor Space
description: Showcase exhibitors at your event and allow them to connect and engage with delegates.

title: Mobile Friendly
description: Oxford Abstracts works seamlessly on mobile or tablet devices for both your admins and delegates.
